name: The Shadow Tower
description:
The Shadow Tower is a magical VR game to experience where you learn  and conduct chemistry experiments on an exciting adventure. Shadows have infested the land and the crown is searching for magical alchemists that can help banish the troublemakers. Prepare and conduct a chemistry experiment in this audio focused experience. Aimed at kids with residual vision, the game has no written text and guidance features to make it possible for everyone to experience chemistry experiments first hand!

Developed at the Hanze University of Applied Sciences as part of the Creative Media & Game Technologies programme.

Team members:

  • Irina Tikhonycheva https://www.linkedin.com/in/irinatikhonycheva/
  • Ayton Nijboer https://ayton-nijboer.itch.io/
  • Marlo Nickol https://www.linkedin.com/in/marlo-nickol/
  • Ana
  • Marit
